price: ដូច្នោះដែរ អល់ឡោះបោះត្រាភ្ជិតលើចិត្ដរបស់ពួកដែល មិនដឹងការពិត។
arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ يَطۡبَعُ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: kadhālika yaṭbaʿu al-lahu ʿalā qulūbi alladhīna lā yaʿlamūna
